roleset.name: intentional climber
roleset.note: MOUNT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mount' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison to 'climb'. (from mount.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: metaphorical, unclear meaning
example.text: AMR climbed 1 3/4 to 73 1/8 amid rumors that [New York developer Donald Trump]-1 was seeking financing *trace*-1 to mount a new, lower offer for the parent company of American Airlines.
example.arg: a new, lower offer for the parent company of American Airlines

roleset.name: non-intentional climber; cf rise
roleset.note: MOUNT-V NOTES: Maps to VN meander-47.7 (from mount.02-v)

example.name: and so forth
example.text: Stock prices fell and bonds rose as worries mounted about the economy and the junk bond market.
example.arg: about the economy and the junk bond market

roleset.name: erect, construct
roleset.note: MOUNT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mount' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison to 'climb'. (from mount.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: oh grow up
example.text: For this, [a crane]-2 needed [*-2]-1 to be mounted [*-1] on the Postels' terrace.
